Uses of Package
org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt

  • Packages that use org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt 
    Package Description
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig
    This package contains classes that can read and write TIGR .contig formatted contig data (also known as .ctg format).
    org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm
    This package contains classes to handle TIGR Assembler formatted assembly files.
    org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.primer
    This module deals with working with sequencing primers.
    org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt
    This package deals with Fasta files that contain NucleotideSequence data.
    org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.nt  
    org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfa
    This package supports reading and writing Maq's Binary Fasta File format .bfa.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.contig 
    Class and Description
    NucleotideFastaDataStore
    NucleotideFastaDataStore is a FastaDataStore for storing Nucleotides.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.assembly.tigr.tasm 
    Class and Description
    NucleotideFastaDataStore
    NucleotideFastaDataStore is a FastaDataStore for storing Nucleotides.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.experimental.primer 
    Class and Description
    NucleotideFastaDataStore
    NucleotideFastaDataStore is a FastaDataStore for storing Nucleotides.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt 
    Class and Description
    FaiNucleotideWriterBuilder
    Class that will create a Fasta Index file (.fai file) from an already existing fasta file.
    NucleotideFastaDataStore
    NucleotideFastaDataStore is a FastaDataStore for storing Nucleotides.
    NucleotideFastaFileDataStore
    A NucleotideFastaDataStore where all the NucleotideFastaRecords in this datastore belong to the same fasta file.
    NucleotideFastaFileDataStoreBuilder
    NucleotideFastaFileDataStoreBuilder is a factory class that can create new instances of NucleotideFastaDataStores using data from a given input fasta file.
    NucleotideFastaRecord
    NucleotideFastaRecord is an implementation of FastaRecord whose sequences are NucleotideSequences.
    NucleotideFastaRecordBuilder
    NucleotideFastaRecordBuilder is a builder class that makes instances of NucleotideFastaRecords.
    NucleotideFastaWriter
    NucleotideFastaWriter is a interface that handles how NucleotideFastaRecords are written.
    NucleotideFastaWriterBuilder
    NucleotideFastaWriterBuilder is a Builder class that will create a new instance of NucleotideFastaWriter that will write fasta encoded data to the given File or OutputStream.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.internal.fasta.nt 
    Class and Description
    NucleotideFastaDataStore
    NucleotideFastaDataStore is a FastaDataStore for storing Nucleotides.
    NucleotideFastaFileDataStore
    A NucleotideFastaDataStore where all the NucleotideFastaRecords in this datastore belong to the same fasta file.
    NucleotideFastaRecord
    NucleotideFastaRecord is an implementation of FastaRecord whose sequences are NucleotideSequences.
  • Classes in org.jcvi.jillion.fasta.nt used by org.jcvi.jillion.maq.bfa 
    Class and Description
    NucleotideFastaWriter
    NucleotideFastaWriter is a interface that handles how NucleotideFastaRecords are written.
